column4: Hi, is it possible to "simulate" a reboot. Im planing to reboot my server but im not sure it will boot and im about 2000 miles from the server and the technichans are not at the spot right now.
well not really.  but if there's something specific you need to reboot you can just reboot that
want to make sure everything works fine.
you pretty much need to reboot to test if a reboot works
